name: GOOSE: Premium Mail Services
description:
We are GOOSE. If you trust in us... well thanks. That's tite.. we don't know what that means, but for sure it's a good thing!

-So, this new post office had some problems lately.  They do not have a good management of incoming packages, and the building's warehouse is not large enough to store all the incoming packages. I'm sorry to tell you that there is not a single experienced employee.

(load so many packages on the truck before you run out of space)
(Dont slap your co workers. That's Rude)

[Can be played with both, keyboard and mouse; and gamepad]
[Up to 4 players in coop]
[2 extra modes TBA lol]
